name: ListingsERC721

@title ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard basic interface
@dev see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-721.md
attributes.name: ERC721Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC-721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional enumeration extension
@dev See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-721.md
attributes.name: ERC721Enumerable

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC-721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional metadata extension
@dev See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-721.md
attributes.name: ERC721Metadata

attributes.documentation:
@title ERC-721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, full implementation interface
@dev See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-721.md
attributes.name: ERC721

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add
